app.title: Hajimi Switch
app.subtitle: One-click sync your API config to local AI tools

steps.step2Hint: Paste the key from your subscription
steps.step3Hint: Sync config to all installed AI tools

settings.urlInvalid: Must start with http:// or https://
settings.httpWarning: Warning: http:// sends your API key in cleartext. Use https:// instead.
settings.saveApiKeyHint: When off, key is kept in memory only and not written to disk

toolDesc.claude: Anthropic's official terminal coding assistant — write and fix code with AI in the command line
toolDesc.claudeVscode: Claude Code extension for VS Code — use Claude AI to code directly in your editor
toolDesc.opencode: Open-source terminal AI coding tool, a lightweight alternative to Claude Code
toolDesc.codex: OpenAI's official terminal coding assistant — use GPT to write code from the command line
toolDesc.gemini: Google's official terminal AI assistant — use Gemini from the command line
toolDesc.openclaw: Multi-platform AI assistant — connect AI to WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord and more
toolDesc.droid: Factory AI desktop coding assistant with a visual interface
toolDesc.cursor: AI code editor based on VS Code with built-in AI coding assistance
toolDesc.chatbox: Lightweight AI chat client — clean, simple, supports multiple models
toolDesc.cherryStudio: Feature-rich multi-model AI chat tool with knowledge base and plugins
toolDesc.jan: Privacy-focused AI chat client — supports local models and cloud APIs
toolDesc.cline: VS Code AI coding extension — write code with AI directly in your editor
toolDesc.rooCode: VS Code AI coding extension (Roo fork) — enhanced Cline
toolDesc.kiloCode: VS Code AI coding extension (Kilo fork) — community-enhanced Cline
toolDesc.sillytavern: Roleplay / RP chat frontend with rich character cards and scenario settings
toolDesc.lobechat: Open-source multi-model chat platform with plugins and knowledge base
toolDesc.boltai: Native macOS AI assistant with system-level quick access

toolHint.claude: After sync, the VS Code extension (Claude Code) is also configured automatically — no extra steps needed
toolHint.openclaw: After sync, run 'openclaw onboard' in terminal to complete first-time setup (gateway & messaging channels)
toolHint.sillytavern: After sync, select the configured API connection in SillyTavern's UI
toolHint.cherryStudio: After sync, switch to the "哈基米 AI" provider in Cherry Studio to use it
toolHint.cursor: Cursor does not support auto-configuration yet — please configure manually in Settings → Models
toolHint.cline: Extension sidebar → Settings → API Provider: "OpenAI Compatible" → enter Base URL and API Key
toolHint.rooCode: Extension sidebar → Settings → API Provider: "OpenAI Compatible" → enter Base URL and API Key
toolHint.kiloCode: Extension sidebar → Settings → API Provider: "OpenAI Compatible" → enter Base URL and API Key
toolHint.lobechat: Settings → Language Model → Add OpenAI-compatible provider → enter API URL and Key
toolHint.boltai: Settings → Models → Add Server → select OpenAI Compatible → enter URL and Key

config.title: {{name}} Config
config.saveConfirm: Are you sure you want to save changes to {{file}}?
config.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Switch file anyway?

confirm.restoreMessage: This will restore all CLI configs to their pre-sync state. Are you sure?
confirm.restoreSingleMessage: This will restore {{name}} config to its pre-sync state. Are you sure?

install.quickStartDesc: Claude Code is the recommended CLI tool. Click to install it automatically via npm.

tabGuide.codingDesc: Write code, fix bugs, and build projects with AI. After syncing, these tools connect to your API automatically.
tabGuide.chatDesc: Chat freely with AI — Q&A, writing, brainstorming. After syncing, these clients connect to your API automatically.
tabGuide.chatRecommend: Recommended: install Chatbox for a clean experience
tabGuide.agentDesc: Connect AI to your favorite messaging platforms (WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, etc.) and use it anywhere.
tabGuide.rpDesc: Roleplay, storytelling, and immersive conversations. After syncing, import character cards and start chatting.

empty.title: No AI tools detected
empty.description: Install any supported AI CLI tool (Claude, Codex, Gemini, Cursor, etc.) and it will appear here automatically.

account.configReady: Config ready — you can now sync to the AI tools below
account.errConnectTimeout: Connection timed out, check the platform URL
account.errConnectFailed: Cannot connect to platform, check the URL
account.errAccountDisabled: This account has been disabled, contact admin
account.errRequire2FA: This account has 2FA enabled — please login on the web and disable 2FA first
account.errNoSessionCookie: Server did not return session credentials, check platform version
